        public final boolean isCardRankedBefore(AbstractCardEntity card)
        Indicates if this card is before the one specified. Note: This method is suite agnostic
        Parameters:
        card - The card to check rank against
        Returns:
        TRUE if the card is ranked before the one specified, false otherwise

      • isOppositeSuite

        public abstract boolean isOppositeSuite(AbstractCardEntity card)
        Indicates if this card's suite is opposite to the card specified. An opposite suite is one that is of different color
        Returns:
        TRUE if this card's suite is opposite to the one specified, FALSE otherwise

      • isSameSuite

        public final boolean isSameSuite(AbstractCardEntity card)
        Indicates if this card's suite is the same as the specified card
        Parameters:
        card - The card check suite against
        Returns:
        TRUE if this card and the card specified are of the SAME suit, FALSE otherwise
